document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Boheman, C. H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Boheman, C. H. (1835) [new taxa]. In: Schonherr, C. J., Genera et species Curculionidum. cum synovmia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyllenhal. C. H. Boheman. et entomologis aliis illustratae. Vol. 4 (1). Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 505 pp. [1836] https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 8952

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
123 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU , IMC , SKC ) from 11 provinces were studied.
Donetsk Prov.
:
2 spec. ( SKC ) Antratsyt Distr. , Dyakove, S. V . Konovalov leg.,
22.v.2006
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Volnovakha Distr. , Velykoanadolskyi Forest , Silantiev leg., Yakovlev ,
25.vi.1894
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Pokrovsk Distr. , Yasenove , Arnoldi leg.,
24.vi.1939
;
7 spec. ( SIZK ) Slovyansk Distr. , Bohorodichne, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
22.vi.1983
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Lyman Distr. , Zakitne, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
21.v.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Novoazovsk Distr. , Samsonove , Khomutovskyi Step Nature Reserve, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
17.vi.1983
;
Kharkiv Prov.
: 1 spec. ( KUMN ) Zmiiv Distr. , Gomilsha ,
5.vii.1975
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Pechenihy Forestry , Grubant leg.,
23.vi.1973
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Zmiiv , Nizhniye Melnitsy landmark, A. Drogvalenko leg.,
18.vi.1994
;
4 spec. ( KUMN ) Dokuchaeva , N. Yunakov leg.,
25.v.1995
, on
Urtica
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) idem,
14.v.1995 , 26.v.1995 , 2.vi.1995
;
2 spec. ( KUMN ) Zmiiv Distr. , Gaydary , A. Bartenev leg., viii.19992
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Chuhuiv , A. Drogvalenko leg.,
vi.1999
;
4 spec. ( KUMN ) Kharkiv , forest park, A. Drogvalenko leg.,
18.vi.1998
; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. :
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Dolinske Distr. , Vesely Bokovenky, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
13.vii.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ), Dolinske Distr. , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
14.vii.1983
;
Poltava Prov.
:
1 ex. ( ZMUN ) Poltava Distr. , Kryukove , P.N. Sheshurak leg.,
29.v.1999
;

Zaporizhia Prov.
: 6 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol Distr. , Staroberdyansky Forest, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
27.vi.1982
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Yakymivka Distr. , Altagir , Altagir forest , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
7.vi.1977
;
6 spec. ( SIZK ) Rozyvka Distr. , Kamyani Mohyly Reserve, S. V . Volovnik ,
14.vi.1983
;
6 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol Distr. , Myrne , reared from stem of
Artemisia vulgaris , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
iv.1983
.

Biology. Meadows, forest edge, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in Vâ€“IX. On
Artemisia vulgaris
( Asteraceae ) ( Volovnik 2012a ).
